name: Zell Menace
description:
The Story:

      You are on a mission to destory the capital class ship, the Korta Impertial.  Endless    armies of space fighters stand between you and their command ship.  You'll need to collect all the money and scrap you can find and upgrade your tiny figher if you are to stand any hope against the it, and the rest of the...ZELL MENACE!

    
The Default Controls:
    Move ship: Arrow Keys
    Fire Lasers: Space
    Fire Homing Missle: Control
    Upgrade Forward Weapons: 1
    Upgrade Diagonal Weapons: 2
    Upgrade Homing Weapons: 3
    Upgrade Generator: 4
    Upgrade Shields: 5
    Upgrade Engine: 6
    Upgrade Armor: 7
